title: list attribute
description: The list attribute is used to identify an element that lists predefined options suggested to the user.

references.title: WHATWG HTML5 spec for the list attribute

assertions.title: convey the presence of the list attribute
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the input will provide suggestions.
examples: might announce that suggestions are available when the input receives focus.
might announce that the input has auto complete functionality.
might modify the role of the associated input to convey datalist functionality, such as changing "edit text" to "Combo box".
